node.title: Late Night Shares Some Juicy Bits From ‘Betrayal’
node.alt: “Remember, this was a former general making a call to the military demanding they support a fascist coup,” Colbert said regarding an item about Michael Flynn. “What is wrong with him? It’s 2021 — just text!”
node.description: Stephen Colbert and Seth Meyers reported some of the most interesting items from Jonathan Karl’s new book.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "Jonathan Karl\u2019s \u201cBetrayal\u201d was published on Tuesday, and late night shared a few of that book\u2019s juicier items regarding former President Trump and Jan. 6, including some tidbits about Michael Flynn and his call for the military to stop Joe Biden from taking office.", "Jimmy Fallon showed off pets that pack suitcases and chug beers better than he can.", "Adam Driver, a \u201cHouse of Gucci\u201d star, will appear on Wednesday\u2019s \u201cLate Show.\u201d", "Todd Haynes\u2019s \u201cThe Velvet Underground\u201d is a deep dive on the New York demimonde that birthed the band, and also a reflection on the cinema and art of the day."]
